content.html: Mind you, someone pretty senior once gave me feedback which said "I know I can trust your technology advice, because you dress like a *proper* geek." So, basically, sartorial signalling is a wild thing which some people take very seriously!
content.value:
Mind you, someone pretty senior once gave me feedback which said "I know I can trust your technology advice, because you dress like a *proper* geek."

So, basically, sartorial signalling is a wild thing which some people take very seriously!
